    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.activity.contextaware.ContextAware, androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcherOwner, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultRegistryOwner, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    public class LobbyActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    This class handles the interaction in the Lobby activity, such as sending a game invite.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void connectUser()
      Create a room in the database, named playerName.
      void contactHandler()
      Contact button handler function.
      void disconnectUser()
      Disconnect the user from the database.
      void handleGuestInGameInvitation​(android.app.AlertDialog.Builder gameRequestDialogBuilder, java.lang.String hostUsername, android.os.Vibrator vibrator)
      Handle guest side when a game invite occurs, by showing the invite dialog and start listening to host response.
      void handleHostInGameInvitation​(android.app.AlertDialog.Builder gameRequestDialogBuilder, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> gameRequestData, android.os.Vibrator vibrator)
      Handle host side when a game invite occurs, by showing the invite dialog and start listening for guest cancellation.
      void initNavHeader()
      init the menu and connect the user to the database when finished.
      void listenForRoomUpdates()
      This function is called when a room gets updated, and checks if isInGame value on the database has changed (means a guest joined the room).
      void onBackPressed()
      When pressing the back button in the phone, the menu will collapse.
      void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)  
      void onDestroy()
      When a application is being destroyed, unregister the broadcast listener and disconnect the user from the database.
      void onStop()
      When the activity is in the "STOP" state (onStop() is called), do clean-ups by removing the listeners, as well as guest and host updates.
      void registerBroadcastListener()
      Registers the broadcast listener.
      void removeFirestorePersistence()
      Remove the Firestore persistence, thus disabling getting data from cache (because we need realtime updates during a game).
      void unregisterBroadcastListener()
      Unregisters the broadcast listener.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • removeFirestorePersistence

        public void removeFirestorePersistence()
        Remove the Firestore persistence, thus disabling getting data from cache (because we need realtime updates during a game).

      • registerBroadcastListener

        public void registerBroadcastListener()
        Registers the broadcast listener.

      • unregisterBroadcastListener

        public void unregisterBroadcastListener()
        Unregisters the broadcast listener.

      • contactHandler

        public void contactHandler()
        Contact button handler function. Creates an Intent object with an ACTION_SENDTO (SMS app), to the developer's phone. The user can send feedback to the developer and report issues and possible add-ons.

      • listenForRoomUpdates

        public void listenForRoomUpdates()
        This function is called when a room gets updated, and checks if isInGame value on the database has changed (means a guest joined the room). if it has then it redirects execution to gameInvitationHandler(), else does nothing.

      • handleGuestInGameInvitation

        public void handleGuestInGameInvitation​(android.app.AlertDialog.Builder gameRequestDialogBuilder,
                                        java.lang.String hostUsername,
                                        android.os.Vibrator vibrator)
        Handle guest side when a game invite occurs, by showing the invite dialog and start listening to host response.
        Parameters:
        gameRequestDialogBuilder - The AlertDialog builder to build the "Challenging" dialog in the guest's phone.
        hostUsername - The host username value (of type String)
        vibrator - The vibrator object to pass to startGame(), if the host accepts the invite.

      • handleHostInGameInvitation

        public void handleHostInGameInvitation​(android.app.AlertDialog.Builder gameRequestDialogBuilder,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> gameRequestData,
                                       android.os.Vibrator vibrator)
        Handle host side when a game invite occurs, by showing the invite dialog and start listening for guest cancellation.
        Parameters:
        gameRequestDialogBuilder - The AlertDialog builder to build the "Challenging" dialog in the host's phone.
        gameRequestData - The host username value (of type String)
        vibrator - The vibrator object to pass to startGame(), if the host accepts the invite.

      • initNavHeader

        public void initNavHeader()
        init the menu and connect the user to the database when finished.

      • disconnectUser

        public void disconnectUser()
        Disconnect the user from the database. This removes the room only if the user is not in a game.

      • connectUser

        public void connectUser()
        Create a room in the database, named playerName. This adds the fields "host" which saves the player's name, and "isInGame" which indicates if the room is taken (in a game)

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        When pressing the back button in the phone, the menu will collapse.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class androidx.activity.ComponentActivity

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        When the activity is in the "STOP" state (onStop() is called), do clean-ups by removing the listeners, as well as guest and host updates.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        When a application is being destroyed, unregister the broadcast listener and disconnect the user from the database. It is important to mention that this callback is not called always.
        Overrides:
        onDestroy in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
        See Also:
        onDestroy is never called
